text: Write a poem inspired by nature and the changing seasons.
Design a poster for a music festival featuring a tropical theme.
Produce a jingle for a new soft drink commercial.
Create a product description for a high-tech smartwatch.
Illustrate a futuristic cityscape for a science fiction book cover.
Compose a background score for a suspenseful movie scene.
Draft a short biography for an influential historical figure.
Design a logo for a new eco-friendly restaurant.
Create a podcast intro for a technology-themed show.
